memberdef.name: SPEHEADER_H
memberdef.initializer: /* define shows that include is now done */

memberdef.name: HDRNAMEMAX
memberdef.initializer: 120 /* max char str length for file name */

memberdef.name: COMMENTMAX
memberdef.initializer: 80 /* User comment string max length (5 comments) */

memberdef.name: DATEMAX
memberdef.initializer: 10 /* string length of file creation date string as ddmmmyyyy\0 */

memberdef.name: ROIMAX
memberdef.initializer: 10 /* Max size of roi array of structures. */
